name: Ringtower
description:
Climb up a randomly generated tower full of monsters and keys. Try to take the diamond treasure above!

Dungeon-crawl your way into the dark caverns and conquer the Ringtower, the remains of a fallen city, subject to corrupted kings, and a curse that haunts the corpses of old inhabitants.

Keyboard and Xbox one support.

The font, Pixelfj Verdana, was made by 1001 fonts for commercial use.

https://www.1001fonts.com/pix-pixelfjverdana12pt-font.html

Art pack made by Kenny.
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike

Thumbnail art, music, and sound effects made by me.
